page.title: 17AMENITIES
page.content: In our area there is a Post Office in{Woods Road}and quite alot of people use it.There is a van that comes round with sweets and crisps and some other things.There is a village hall which is used for family discos, jumble sales,play _ school and keep-fit .There is a bus service which goes to {Chelmsford}from{Dunmow}to{Saffron {Walden}.There is a bus that stops out side our school.The bus runs from morning till 8.o clock at night.There is a library van that comes round and stops out side the church and there is a butcher's van that comes round as well.There is one school in our area mostly{Ford End}children go there.The other side of the school there is a cricket field alot of people go and play cricket there.
